description:
Highlights <pre code> HTML using the highlight.js library.

Editor: https://bubble.io/page?type=page&name=code_highlight&id=tiptap-plugin&test_plugin=1670612027178x122079323974008830_current&tab=tabs-1
name: Code syntax highlighter
plugin_instructions:
1. 𝗔𝗗𝗗 𝗘𝗟𝗘𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗧𝗢 𝗣𝗔𝗚𝗘
Add the `code highlighter` to the a page. 

2. 𝗥𝗨𝗡 𝗜𝗧
Create an event with an action to highlight the code.

3. optional 𝗖𝗛𝗔𝗡𝗚𝗘 𝗦𝗧𝗬𝗟𝗘𝗦 𝗗𝗬𝗡𝗔𝗠𝗜𝗖𝗔𝗟𝗟𝗬
Set dynamic styles to one of the many styles listed below.


Comma-separated list of available highlighting styles
You can use this in a dropdown with arbitrary text: split by ,


Default,A 11 Y Dark,A 11 Y Light,Agate,An Old Hope,Androidstudio,Arduino Light,Arta,Ascetic,Atom One Dark,Atom One Dark Reasonable,Atom One Light,Base16 / 3024,Base16 / Apathy,Base16 /
